roleset.name: speak unclearly
roleset.note: MUMBLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mumble' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 37.3. (from mumble.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: My questions on this subject ... were greeted with derision and some mumbled comments about that report being discredited.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: He mumbled to her as he picked her up and carried her to his horse.
example.arg: as he picked her up and carried her to his horse.
